data.text: @OhBeing An anti-masker at our former vet wore one of these (the other anti-masker there wore a perma mask-beard). Utterly ridiculous, and putting them at higher risk. I think they were made specifically for the antimask community.
@brentmYYC If I weren't already following you, I'd follow you just for this comment. Seriously 😂
@Wanda_WestCoast Seems me they'd be great gifts for ambivalent "I give a fuck but I don't give a fuck hmm unsure" people in our lives.
@showmethedataBC Darwin would have a field day with this pandemic.
@OhBeing Why do they even sell these things? What are they for anyways?

@OhBeing There’s an anti masker cashier at a local grocery chain now wearing one of these funnel style things. White Spot had them in the beginning. it was literally a Covid funnel =outbreaks. But this cashier was always a nose peeker or would unmask to talk on the phone.
@OhBeing It's like handing out ivermectin at a glory hole.
@OhBeing I saw a woman wearing the exact one a couple days ago in SaveOn. Like, why bother? If you’re not going to make an effort to wear a proper mask, what’s the point in half-assing it?
@karen_kelowna Absolutely. Plus she was quite short, so her breath funnels upward into others’ faces and visa versa. Worse than no mask.
